purpleculture_pinyin:
mán
to conceal from; to keep (sb) in the dark
скрыть от; держать (сб) в темноте
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 瞒)
Pictophonetic: 㒼 indicates the sound; 目 (eye) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
瞞報 [ mán bào ]: to conceal or deceive in a report; to falsify by over- or underreporting
瞞騙 [ mán piàn ]: to deceive; to conceal
瞞天過海 [ mán tiān guò hǎi ]: to cross the sea by a trick (idiom); to achieve one's aim by underhanded means
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 目 [ mù ] eye; to look, to see; division, topic
    • 㒼 [ mán ] average; equivalent
heisig_chinese_memo: I distracted my girlfriend's eyes to dissemble (hide the truth from) my suprise - bucket of flowers being carried by my yoke.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: an average (㒼) eye (目) can be deceived
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: I distracted my girlfriend's eyes to dissemble (hide the truth from) my suprise - buckets of flowers being carried by my yoke.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "目", the sound of "㒼" means closing eyes. "Shuowen": "Pingmu also. From the head, 㒼 sound." "Yi Zhou Shu-Baodian": "Shallow to hide, the plan is to win."

" Hiding " can represent concealment, deception. "Zhu Zi Yu Lei" Volume Seventy Four: "After all, how can you use it in a humble manner? The Shi family concealed these words from others, and the scholars did not know them, so he concealed them.

" Hidden " also means something shameless and undisclosed. "Jin Ping Mei Ci Hua" Chapter 73: "You and I were concealing goods, so I can't deal with his heart, just let him say."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " head ", the sound of "㒼" indicates the appearance of closed eyes.
humanum_full_description:
從「目」，「㒼」聲，表示閉目貌。《說文》：「平目也。从目，㒼聲。」《逸周書‧寶典》：「淺薄閒瞞，其謀乃獲。」

　　「瞞」可表示隱瞞、欺騙。《朱子語類》卷七四：「畢竟怎生會恁地發用，釋氏便將這些子來瞞人，秀才不識，便被他瞞。」

　　「瞞」亦表示見不得人的、不能公開的。《金瓶梅詞話》第73回：「你我本等是瞞貨，應不上他的心，隨他說去罷了。」

瞞 (Simplified: 瞒)
Pinyin: mán
English Definition: to conceal from; to keep (sb) in the dark
Total strokes: 16; Radical: 目
Pictophonetic: 㒼 indicates the sound; 目 (eye) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:

    • 目 [ mù ] eye; to look, to see; division, topic
    • 㒼 [ mán ] average; equivalent

瞞報 [ mán bào ]: to conceal or deceive in a report; to falsify by over- or underreporting
瞞騙 [ mán piàn ]: to deceive; to conceal
瞞天過海 [ mán tiān guò hǎi ]: to cross the sea by a trick (idiom); to achieve one's aim by underhanded means

Story: I distracted my girlfriend's eyes to dissemble (hide the truth from) my suprise - buckets of flowers being carried by my yoke.
Kind: traditional

從「 目 」，「 㒼 」聲，表示閉目貌。《說文》：「平目也。从目，㒼聲。」《逸周書‧寶典》：「淺薄閒瞞，其謀乃獲。」 「 瞞 」可表示隱瞞、欺騙。《朱子語類》卷七四：「畢竟怎生會恁地發用，釋氏便將這些子來瞞人，秀才不識，便被他瞞。」 「 瞞 」亦表示見不得人的、不能公開的。《金瓶梅詞話》第73回：「你我本等是瞞貨，應不上他的心，隨他說去罷了。」
From " 目", the sound of " 㒼" means closing eyes. "Shuowen": "Pingmu also. From the head, 㒼 sound." "Yi Zhou Shu-Baodian": "Shallow to hide, the plan is to win." " Hiding" can represent concealment, deception. "Zhu Zi Yu Lei" Volume Seventy Four: "After all, how can you use it in a humble manner? The Shi family concealed these words from others, and the scholars did not know them, so he concealed them. " Hidden" also means something shameless and undisclosed. "Jin Ping Mei Ci Hua" Chapter 73: "You and I were concealing goods, so I can't deal with his heart, just let him say."

瞞字的基本解释

瞞
mán

瞞
mén
均见“瞒”。

瞞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mán］
［《廣韻》母官切，平桓，明。］
“瞒1”的繁体字。
(1)闭目貌。
(2)隐瞒；欺骗。
(3)见不得人的；不能公开的。
(4)铺；垫。
(5)顺着；沿着。
(6)通“滿”。
(7)通“顢”。参见“瞞瞞頇頇”。
(8)见“瞞怨”。
[②]［mén］
［《集韻》謨奔切，平魂，明。］
“瞒2”的繁体字。
惭愧。参见“瞞2然”。

瞞字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　瞞； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页816第09
【唐韻】母官切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】謨官切，?滿平聲。【說文】平目也。【徐曰】目瞼低也。杜林曰：目眥平貌。　又【廣韻】目不明也。【荀子·非十二子篇】酒食聲色之中，則瞞瞞然。【註】閉目貌。　又匿情相欺亦曰瞞。【汲冢周書】淺薄閒瞞，其謀乃獲。　又人名。【魏志·武帝紀】太祖姓曹諱操，小字阿瞞。　又鄋瞞，長翟國名。【左傳·文十一年】鄋瞞侵齊。　又城名。【舊唐書·地理志】西域於解蘇國所治，治數瞞城，置以其王領之。　又姓。【風俗通】荆蠻之後，本姓蠻，後爲瞞氏。　又【集韻】謨奔切，音門。慚貌。【莊子·天地篇】子貢瞞然慙。【註】又音蠻。　又母版切，蠻上聲。義同。　又母本切，門上聲。暗也。　【正字通】瞞與樠別，韻會引莊子，以爲門戸則液瞞，謝惠連詩：永保液瞞。叶音綿，不知莊本作樠，以瞞爲樠，誤。

瞞字的起名意思

暂无。
